title: Exosome isolation from serum using ExoQuick reagent
procedures:
1.  Transfer 200 µl of serum into a 1.5 ml microfuge tube.
  2. Add 50 μl of ExoQuick Exosome Precipitation Solution to the serum and incubate 30 min at 4°C.
  3. Centrifuge ExoQuick/serum mixture at 1,500 × g for 30 minutes at room temperature. 
  4. Aspirate supernatant. 
  5. Spin down residual ExoQuick solution by centrifugation at 1,500 × g for 5 minutes at room temperature. 
  6. Remove all traces of fluid by aspiration, taking great care not to disturb the pellet.
  7. Resuspend the pellet in 20 μl sterile PBS.
